QuestData.Title: The Obsidian Citadel
QuestData.Description:
<At a glance, this seems to be internal communications between djaradin camps.
The words 'Obsidian Citadel' leap out at you.
Perhaps Wrathion would be interested in seeing this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Give the Qalashi Plans to Wrathion.
QuestData.RewardText:
A treat! I love seeing into the minds of my enemies. Helps me strike fast, strike true.
Let's see...
The Obsidian Citadel?
No.
No!
